column1: Art Institute of Chicago////We had about an hour before the museum closed so a friend of ours took us on a rapid fire tour of all the favorite works of art in the museum. In that hour
column2: we actually saw probably the vast majority of the museum. Of course
column3: we didn't get a chance to really sit down and admire each painting/photo/piece of art
column4: but we got a feel for what the museum had to offer.
